sentences.en: Barack and Michelle Obama are also a more fully fused political team than ever before, with no other jobs to distract them, no doubts about the worthiness of the pursuit dogging them.
sentences.cn: 因为没有其他工作让他们分心，也毫不怀疑他们追求的事业的价值，所以巴拉克和米歇尔·奥巴马比以往任何时候都更加融洽。

sentences.en: Euripides said: When love is in excess , it brings a man no honor nor worthiness.
sentences.cn: 欧里庇得斯[希腊悲剧诗人]说: 爱得太深, 会失去荣耀和价值.

sentences.en: However, corporate credit - worthiness is a key factor in assessing the value and risk of corporate bonds.
sentences.cn: 不过, 要评估一家公司债券的价值和风险,主要因素在于该公司的可信贷程度.
我怀疑他是否值得信赖.

sentences.en: It'satisfies the spraying robot's function requirement and has practical worthiness. "
sentences.cn: 运行试验表明,系统工作稳定可靠,满足了喷雾机器人的功能要求,具有实用价值.

sentences.en: Major competitive force of nursing education is characterized by knowledge, worthiness, entirety, dynamics and peculiarity.
sentences.cn: 护理教育核心竞争力具有知识性 、 价值性 、 整体性 、 动态性、独特性等特性.

sentences.en: Political correctness now debates the worthiness of many words.
sentences.cn: 现在,人们常用立场正确来讨论许多词的价值.

sentences.en: So we must ask what lends objective worthiness to a life outside the moral realm.
sentences.cn: 所以在道德范畴之外，我们必须设问，是什么东西带给人生客观性的值得。

sentences.en: Some find popularity and artistic worthiness to be opposites and therefore, reject bands that become successful.
sentences.cn: 一些人发现流行程度和艺术价值是对立的，因此否定那些逐步成功的乐队。

sentences.en: Some people are afraid to take risks because their belief in their own worthiness is so low.
sentences.cn: 有些人害怕冒险，因为他们妄自菲薄。

sentences.en: The judge will evaluate the worthiness of these claims.
sentences.cn: 法官会评估这些索赔的价值.

sentences.en: There is much democratic insistence on the worthiness of every level of birth and work.
sentences.cn: 很多民众坚持认为每个层次的出身和工作都值得尊重.

sentences.en: When love is in excess, it brings a man no honor nor worthiness.
sentences.cn: 当爱太深, 就会让人失去荣耀与价值.

sentences.en: While buying a car you cannot compromise on its safety aspects and road worthiness.
sentences.cn: 虽然买车你不能妥协的安全问题和公路的价值.

words.tran_cn: 无价值的；不值钱的；卑微的
值得做的，值得花时间的
值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

phrases.tran_cn: 信贷可靠性；信誉；信贷价值
